- Chat responses must be concise, polite, and written in Japanese.
- All documents (design documents, source files, comments, etc.) must be written in English unless otherwise instructed.
- When executing terminal commands, use the `execute_command` tool from the `terminal-runner` MCP server.
- When investigating or implementing code, always activate Serena MCP first before starting any work.
